q001.name: First Steps
q001.description: A simple reconnaissance mission to help you get familiar with the Zone.
q001.objective: Travel to the Garbage and scout for items.

q002.name: Mutant Hunting
q002.description: Local stalkers are bothered by mutants in the area. Hunt them down.
q002.objective: Hunt and kill any 3 mutants in Cordon.

q003.name: Artifact Hunt
q003.description: An ecologist needs an artifact for research.
q003.objective: Find any artifact and bring it back.

q004.name: Bandit Cleanup
q004.description: A group of bandits has been terrorizing stalkers. Deal with them.
q004.objective: Hunt in Garbage and eliminate bandit threats.

q005.name: Rare Equipment
q005.description: A trader is looking for specific equipment that can only be found in abandoned military caches.
q005.objective: Explore Dark Valley and find military equipment.

q006.name: Laboratory Documents
q006.description: Valuable research documents are hidden in Yantar's laboratory.
q006.objective: Travel to Yantar and scout for documents.

q007.name: Duty Recruitment
q007.description: Duty is looking for new members. Prove your worth by hunting dangerous mutants.
q007.objective: Hunt and kill mutants in Red Forest.

q008.name: Freedom's Cause
q008.description: Freedom wants you to secure a route through a dangerous area.
q008.objective: Travel to Red Forest and scout the area.

q009.name: Monolith Hunt
q009.description: Dangerous Monolith fighters have been spotted in Pripyat. Eliminate them.
q009.objective: Travel to Pripyat and hunt down Monolith fighters.

q010.name: Heart of the Zone
q010.description: A wealthy client wants a rare artifact from the center of the Zone.
q010.objective: Travel to CNPP and use your detector to find a rare artifact.
